bill.title: An act relating to the Administrative Procedure Act
bill.description: An act relating to the Administrative Procedure Act

history.action: Committee bill read the first time and placed on Notice Calendar on March 2, 2018
Read Second Time
Rep. Kitzmiller of Montpelier spoke for the committee on Government Operations
Third Reading Ordered
Read Third time and Passed
Read 1st time & referred to Committee on Government Operations
Entered on Notice Calendar
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Government Operations
New Business/Second Reading
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Government Operations
Unfinished Business/Second Reading
Favorable report with proposal of amendment by Committee on Government Operations
Read 2nd time, reported favorably with proposal of amendment by Senator White for Committee on Government Operations
Proposal of amendment by Committee on Government Operations agreed to
3rd reading ordered
New Business/Third Reading
Read 3rd time & passed in concurrence with proposal of amendment
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Senate Message, passed in Concurrence with proposal of amendment
Rules Suspended and Taken up for Immediate Consideration as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
Senate Proposal of Amendment considered

Senate Proposal of Amendment concurred in with further amendment thereto, as offered by Rep. Townsend of South Burlington, Brumsted of Shelburne, Devereux of Mount Holly, Gannon of Wilmington, Gardner of Richmond, Harrison of Chittenden, LaClair of Barre Town, Lewis of Berlin, and Weed of Enosburgh
Rules suspended and bill messaged forthwith to the Senate as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
Entered on Notice Calendar
House proposal of amendment to Senate proposal of amendment
House message House concurred in Senate proposal of amendment with proposal of amendment
New Business/House Proposal of Amendment
Unfinished Business/House Proposal of Amendment
Proposal of amendment to be offered by Senator(s) White, Ayer, Clarkson, Collamore, and Pearson
Unfinished Business/House Proposal of Amendment
Proposal of amendment to be offered by Senator(s) White, Ayer, Clarkson, Collamore, and Pearson
House proposal of amendment to Senate proposal of amendment, text
Senator White, Ayer, Clarkson, Collamore, and Pearson moved to concur in House proposal of amendment with proposal of amendment; text
House proposal of amendment concurred in with further proposal of amendment as moved by Senator(s) White, Ayer, Clarkson, Collamore, and Pearson
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Balint
Senate message, House proposal of amendment concurred in with further amendment thereto
Rules Suspended and Taken up for Immediate Consideration as moved by Rep. Turner of Milton
Action Postponed to next legislative day as moved by Rep. Kitzmiller of Montpelier
Senate Proposal of Amendment considered
Senate Proposal of Amendment concurred in
Delivered to the Governor on May 16, 2018
Signed by Governor on May 21, 2018
House message: Governor approved bill on May 21, 2018
